commits.author: Michael Sheets
commits.body: Add Homebrew locations, add node requirement. Fixes #9.

commits.author: Alhadis
commits.body: Methods that happen to be named "class" shouldn't trigger an autoindent.

commits.author: Wliu
commits.summary: Commas no longer capture spaces after the comma

commits.author: Wliu
commits.summary: Check for word boundaries when attempting to auto-indent

commits.author: Wliu
commits.body: Fixes atom/language-coffee-script#43

commits.author: Michael Sheets
commits.body: Support punctuation.whitespace and allow `{` to follow the `#`.

commits.author: Michael Sheets
commits.body: This prevents matching whitespace as entity.name

commits.author: Jonathan Boiser
commits.summary: Move boolean pattern matcher before function pattern.

commits.author: Jonathan Boiser
commits.summary: Allow instance vars to be first arg of a function
commits.body: Fixes atom/language-coffee-script#75

commits.author: Adrian Lee
commits.body: Discussed in atom/language-coffee-script#68

commits.author: Kevin Sawicki
commits.summary: Parse left hand side of == the same as right side
commits.body:
Previously false == foo and foo == false would not be colorized
the same way.

commits.author: Kevin Sawicki
commits.body: Closes atom/language-coffee-script#42

commits.author: Kevin Sawicki
commits.summary: Add ? to assignment look-behind character class

commits.author: Kevin Sawicki
commits.summary: Don't parse prototype properties as variables/keywords

commits.author: Kevin Sawicki
commits.body:
and=, or=, +=, -=, etc. are now tokenized as variable assignments.

Closes atom/language-coffee-script#28

commits.author: Kevin Sawicki
commits.summary: Check for whitespace/end of line after class
commits.body:
Prevents matching properties or variables that contain
the word class in them such as classList

Closes atom/language-coffee-script#41

commits.author: Lee Dohm
commits.summary: Change this to be tokenized as a special variable
commits.body: Discussed in atom/language-coffee-script#39

commits.author: Lee Dohm
commits.body:
Per the specification, `this` is a JavaScript keyword that is forbidden
from being used as a variable or property name. So we should tokenize it
as a keyword and not a variable.

See: http://coffeescript.org/documentation/docs/lexer.html#section-69

Fixes atom/language-coffee-script#36

commits.author: Kevin Sawicki
commits.body:
Previously this was a little too aggressive and was colorizing email
addresses that commonly occur in license header blocks.

Closes atom/language-coffee-script#37

commits.author: lenaic
commits.body: Fixes atom/language-coffee-script#19

commits.author: Jack Wearden
commits.summary: 'class' shouldn't be highlighted at the end of a word

commits.author: Kevin Sawicki
commits.body: Closes atom/language-coffee-script#24

commits.author: Kevin Sawicki
commits.body:
Previously they looked for an end pattern of either } or ]
causing incorrect highlighting when both {} and [] were used
on the same line.

Closes atom/language-coffee-script#15

commits.author: Kevin Sawicki
commits.summary: Check that operator keywords aren't hash keys
commits.body:
Previously having object keys/ivars such as delete would be highlighted
as keywords instead of keys/functions.

commits.author: Chiang Fu
commits.body: So that we don't mistakenly use these words.

commits.author: Michael Sheets
commits.summary: Include source.js in embedded JavaScript strings
commits.body: Also use the `meta.embedded` scope and add `source.js` scope.

commits.author: abe33
commits.summary: Replace literate coffeescript rules with an include of source.coffee
commits.body:
In my experience, having done it for a while in ST, I didn’t find a
case where the inclusion of the coffeescript source was causing an
issue, and in practice it simplify greatly the modifications.

commits.author: Kevin Sawicki
commits.summary: Allow trailing whitespace in indent pattern

commits.author: Kevin Sawicki
commits.summary: Indent catch statements with no error arg

commits.author: Michael Sheets
commits.body: Extension list taken from github/linguist.

commits.author: Mike Smiley
commits.summary: Add if main snippet to Constructs submenu (<kbd class='tabTrigger'>ifmain⇥</kbd>)

commits.author: Anton
commits.body:
+ Fold multiline arrays to `[..]` wherever it been
+ Fold object nesting

commits.author: Michael Sheets
commits.summary: Improve string scopes to match conventions

commits.author: Michael Sheets
commits.body: This also improves the selection behavior of variables in basic assignments and the scope of variable assignments.

commits.author: Michael Sheets
commits.body:
The `{,N}` extension is not supported by most Regexp engines, as it is
an Onigurma-only extension.

commits.author: Smiledawgg
commits.summary: Add Run (Terminal) command (to run coffee script in Terminal)

commits.author: Michael Sheets
commits.body: Titlecase various menu titles and add description.

commits.author: Kevin Sawicki
commits.summary: Indent after switch and when statements
